gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hawks 112, Cavaliers 101
gameRecap.excerpt: The Hawks defeated the Cavaliers, 112-101. Saddiq Bey recorded 23 points and eight rebounds for the Hawks, while Bogdan Bogdanovic added 23 points and six assists in the victory. Jarrett Allen notched 18 points and 19 rebounds for the Cavaliers in the losing effort. The Hawks have won back-to-back games as they improve to 28-34 on the season, while the Cavaliers fall to 40-22.
